aiPanel.title: AI Control Panel
aiPanel.removedScopesHint: The following features have been converted from AI/LLM to fixed-rule algorithms and no longer consume tokens:
aiPanel.classSummaryHint: Generated independently for each class, sharing this config
aiPanel.noScopeData: No data for this scope today
aiPanel.systemPromptPlaceholder: Leave empty to use the built-in default prompt
aiPanel.systemPromptDescription: Customize the system prompt for this module to control AI's role and output style
aiPanel.temperatureHint: Lower values are more stable, higher values are more creative
aiPanel.promptDescDuty:
Input: Today's planned check items, recent high-failure items, this week's pass rate

Output JSON:
{
  "focusPoints": [{ "title": "...", "reason": "..." }],
  "tips": ["Check tip..."],
  "recentIssues": ["Recent frequent issue..."]
}
aiPanel.promptDescClassSummary:
Input: Class name, pass rate, recent grade, non-compliant item details
(Each class has an independent scope: class-summary-{className})

Output JSON:
{
  "classSummary": "Class weekly performance summary",
  "classAdvice": ["Improvement suggestion 1", "Improvement suggestion 2"],
  "weakAreas": [{ "title": "...", "failRate": 25 }]
}

analysis.trendUp: This week's pass rate is {rate}%, up {diff} points from last week, showing an upward trend.
analysis.trendDown: This week's pass rate is {rate}%, down {diff} points from last week, showing a decline that needs attention.
analysis.trendStable: This week's pass rate is {rate}%, roughly the same as last week, staying stable.
analysis.gradeTrendUp: Grade {grade} pass rate is {rate}% this week, up {diff} points from last week, improving.
analysis.gradeTrendDown: Grade {grade} pass rate is {rate}% this week, down {diff} points from last week, needs attention.
analysis.gradeTrendStable: Grade {grade} pass rate is {rate}% this week, about the same as last week, stable.
analysis.riskHighSuggestion: Strengthen daily checks on "{title}", consider adding to mandatory items
analysis.riskMediumSuggestion: Increase check frequency for "{title}", monitor weak classes
analysis.weakHighSuggestion: Strengthen management of "{title}", prioritize as a key improvement area
analysis.weakMediumSuggestion: Pay more attention to "{title}", follow up promptly
analysis.keepCurrentPaceReason: All check items have good pass rates in the last 30 days, keep it up
analysis.classTeacherAdviceBad1: Strengthen daily management and focus on weak areas
analysis.classTeacherAdviceBad2: Follow up on non-compliant items promptly
analysis.classTeacherAdviceGood2: Focus on details to achieve an even better grade

suggestions.gradeAReason: Daily pass rate {rate}%, all weekly reviews excellent
suggestions.stableRunningDefault: Running smoothly, overall compliance is good
suggestions.highFailRateReason: Recent fail rate {rate}%, needs focused attention
suggestions.noRecordSuggest: No recent check records, consider adding to rotation
suggestions.lowDataHint: Limited historical data, recommendations will improve with more data
suggestions.suggestNote: Generated from {count} historical records using fixed rules

modules.dailyRecommendDesc: Recommend daily check items from D-1~D-9 based on historical data
modules.gradeDesc: Grade-level analysis for grade leaders (shared config for all grades)
modules.dutyDesc: Daily check suggestions and tips for duty teachers
modules.classSummaryDesc: Weekly work summary suggestions for class teachers

desc.D-1: No visible litter or stains on floor, blackboard wiped clean; no more than 1/3 of desks misaligned, cleaning tools and sports equipment in place
desc.D-2: Assigned area outside classroom (corridors, stairs, etc.) free of litter, no obvious man-made damage on walls
desc.D-3: All students seated quietly within 1 minute after the bell, no more than 2 still walking or chatting
desc.D-4: No more than 2 students with disruptive behavior such as lying on desk, turning to chat, or interrupting
desc.D-5: No running, chasing, pushing, or climbing railings in corridors, stairs, or classrooms (normal playground activity excluded)
desc.D-6: Class quiet after music starts, no more than 2 students with eyes open or talking
desc.D-7: Assembly within 3 minutes of bell, quiet and orderly lines, no more than 1/5 of students with noticeably poor form
desc.D-8: Neat attire, wearing uniform on required days; greeting teachers proactively; no name-calling or other uncivil behavior among students
desc.D-9: Orderly and quiet lines at dismissal, no students lingering without reason; lights off, windows and doors closed
desc.W-1: Count unexcused outdoor class absences (no prior leave request and no post-absence excuse): 0 / 1 / 2+
desc.W-2: Record safety incidents requiring nurse's office or higher-level attention, and their handling
desc.W-3: Record student conflicts requiring teacher intervention or formal reporting
desc.W-4: Record parent concerns submitted through official channels (phone, email, in-person, or via class teacher) requiring school response
desc.W-5: A (Excellent): Pass rate ≥90%, no serious/moderate fails, W-1~W-4 all 0; B (Good): 70%~89%, each ≤1; C (Warning): <70% or serious fail or any ≥2

setup.title: Attendance Setup

setup.assignmentHint: Format: Class | Subject | Teacher. New teacher accounts will be created automatically
setup.defaultPasswordHint: Newly created teacher accounts will use this password
setup.markOutdoorDesc: Check subjects that are outdoor classes. Only outdoor classes require attendance tracking
setup.clearExistingWarn: This will delete all existing course arrangements and attendance records
setup.unmatchedClasses: The following class names could not be matched
